name: Lean on Me
description: Leah and Corey take Ali to the geneticist and get some troubling news that she may have a genetic disorder. Jenelle and Kieffer reunite after he is bailed out of jail but tension builds when they have to face court for their breaking and entering charges. Chelsea takes steps towards being more independent and gets some surprising news that her old friend Megan is pregnant. Jo agrees to let Kailyn take Isaac for a few hours on his birthday so she can throw him a party, but Kailyn gets annoyed when she notices Joâ€™s not around when she drops Isaac off.
